issue.title: [CF 1397] v 8.3.3 Metamorphosis (DH ability) not showing cooldown timer
issue.body:
Tracking metamorphosis (spellId 191427) does not rack the cooldown come 7.2 Meaning if you track it, it will show as an icon or bar but it will never show a cooldown timer.

 

I don't feel this is solely a TMW issue as I hear weakauras is having a similar issue. I think it is something that changed in 7.2


> Posted by CurseForge user transitbus | Imported from CurseForge issue #1397 | Raw

comments.body:
Track it by ID and it should work. Blizzard broke it in 7.2.

Edited Apr 3, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
